tooltips.home_stone.shift.held: Shift right click in off hand to set location. Right click in main hand to teleport there! Only works in the overworld!
tooltips.advanced_home_stone.shift.held: Shift right click in off hand to set location. Right click in main hand to teleport there! Works across the overworld, nether and end!
tooltips.super_home_stone.shift.held: Shift right click in off hand to set location. Right click in main hand to teleport there! Works across all dimensions!
tooltip.advanced_home_stone.invalid_dime: Cannot be used in this dimension!
tooltips.death_stone.shift.held: Right click to return to your latest death point. Works across any dimension
tooltips.ender_scrambler.shift.held: Place down to prevent enderman from teleporting away!
tooltips.fan.shift.held: Place down to push entities in a certain direction!
tooltips.wallet.shift.held: With the wallet in your off hand, shift right click %s in your main hand to add them to your wallet! Right click to remove %s!
tooltips.wrench_item.shift.held: When held look at a block to see more information!
tooltips.floating_block.place_in_air: Place in the air or inside water!
tooltips.scrambler_item.shift.held: Used to control the Ender Scrambler! Right click in main hand to increase range, Shift right click in main hand to decrease range, Right click in off hand to toggle between on and off!
jei.opolisutilities.resource_generator_2:
The resource generator 2 is a block that will duplicate items like cobblestone and stone.

Any block that can store items can be placed underneath the resource generator 2 including hoppers and chests.

When working the resource generator 2 will turn blue and start to provide items to the inventory below.

Speed blocks can be placed on top to increase the speed blocks are produced.

Pressing U on the resource generator 2 will show all blocks that it can mine as well as any blocks that can effect its speed.

At a base speed it will collect 1 block every 11 seconds.
jei.opolisutilities.fluid_generator.info:
The fluid generator is a block that will create fluids and output the fluid into a tank below.

Any block that can store fluids can be placed underneath the fluid generator.

When working the fluid generator 2 will turn blue and start to provide fluid to the tank below.

Speed blocks can be placed on top to increase the speed blocks are produced.

Pressing U on the fluid generator will show all fluid that it can collect as well as any blocks that can effect its speed.

At a base speed it will collect a certain amount (shown in JEI) of fluid every 11 seconds.
